background: Deploy a full production-grade, FISMA-aligned multi-AZ environment using a single TapStack.yml CloudFormation template in us-east-1. The stack provisions a new VPC with subnets, NAT gateways, endpoints, ALB, Auto Scaling Group, Aurora PostgreSQL, S3 buckets, CloudTrail, GuardDuty, AWS Config, and Lambda. All data is KMS-encrypted, logging and monitoring are centralized, and IAM roles follow least-privilege principles with consistent project tagging and environment suffixing for secure, compliant infrastructure automation.
author: iqbala-turing
